description: Monitor for many failed authentication attempts across various accounts that may result from password spraying attempts. It is difficult to detect when hashes are cracked, since this is generally done outside the scope of the target network. Analytic 1 - Multiple failed logon attempts across different accounts. (index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode IN (4625, 5379)) OR (index=security sourcetype="linux_secure" message="Failed password") OR (index=security sourcetype="macos_secure" message="Failed to authenticate user")
